original_text: Simon Peter looked towards that disciple and said to him, ‘Ask Jesus who he is speaking about.’
korean_text: 시몬 베드로가 머릿짓을 하여 말하되 말씀하신 자가 누구인지 말하라 하니

sentences.original_text: Simon Peter looked towards that disciple
Ask Jesus who he is speaking about
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 누구에 대해 말씀하고 계신지 물어보라
